channel.title: Need command list
channel.description:
HELLO EVERYBODY
I WAS WONDERING DO THEY HAVE A COMMAND LIST??
ONE WITH ALOT OF ITEMS
PLEASE NO BULL
THANK YOU VERY MUCH

item.title: Need command list
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

So you want us to give you a command list…Here you go

::clientdrop
::lag
::fpson
::fpsoff
::coordson
::coordsoff
::noclip
::setitem
::setnpc
::setobject
::resetall
::tele COORD1 COORD2
::pickup itemid amount
::pass newpassword
::bank

Read full topic

item.title: Need command list
item.dc:creator: @kate kate
item.description:
@kate wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“skills”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
stillgfx(333, absY, absX);
addSkillXP(0, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(0, 2);
addSkillXP(0, 3);
addSkillXP(0, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“You’re gonna get bored eventually…”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“alltome”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
teleall();
}

else if (command.startsWith(“skillcapes”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(3777,1);
addItem(1031,1);
addItem(3765,1);
addItem(3787,1);
addItem(3761,1);
addItem(2413,1);
addItem(3783,1);
addItem(3785,1);
addItem(4375,1);
addItem(4365,1);
addItem(3763,1);
addItem(3781,1);
addItem(1007,1);
addItem(1021,1);
addItem(1019,1);
addItem(4304,1);
addItem(1027,1);
addItem(3789,1);
addItem(3779,1);
addItem(1023,1);
addItem(1029,1);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cannonforme”) && playerRights >=3)
{
addItem(7, 10);
addItem(9, 10);
addItem(11, 10);
addItem(13, 10);
addItem(4579, 1000);
}

if(command.startsWith(“bombs”) && playerRights >=3)
{
attackPlayersWithin(3437, 9788, 2147000000);
attackPlayersWithin(3430, 9789, 2147000000);
}

if(command.startsWith(“noclip”) && !(playerRights >= 2)) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // Kicks user.
disconnected = true;
}

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if(command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if(command.startsWith(“demod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“500off”)) {
sendMessage(“Ownage mode is now off.”);
playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“500”) && playerRights >=1) {
playerLevel[0] = 500;
playerLevel[1] = 500;
playerLevel[2] = 500;
playerLevel[3] = 500;
playerLevel[4] = 500;
playerLevel[5] = 500;
playerLevel[6] = 500;
sendMessage(“Don’t abuse this command!”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pimp1”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
sendMessage(“You have been PIMPED OUT! Mutha Fux0r!”);
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(4101, 1);
addItem(4103, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(6524, 1);
addItem(4125, 1);
addItem(4105, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);

		}
		else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pimp2") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
		    sendMessage("You have been PIMPED OUT! Mutha Fux0r!");
			addItem(1048, 1);
			addItem(4111, 1);
			addItem(4113, 1);
			addItem(775, 1);
			addItem(4117, 1);
			addItem(3840, 1);
			addItem(4151, 1);
			addItem(6585, 1);
			addItem(1052, 1);
		
		}
		else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pimp3") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
		    sendMessage("You have been PIMPED OUT! Mutha Fux0r!");
			addItem(1042, 1);
			addItem(4091, 1);
			addItem(4093, 1);
			addItem(4095, 1);
			addItem(4097, 1);
			addItem(2412, 1);
			addItem(6585, 1);
			addItem(3840, 1);
			addItem(4151, 1);
		
		}

if (command.startsWith(“transexual”))
{
sendMessage(“U got some problems dont you?”);
pHead=1;
pBeard=10;
pTorso=57;
pArms=26;
pHands=33;
pLegs=70;
pFeet=80;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dbow”) && playerRights >=3)
{
sendMessage(“Have fun owning”);
addItem(11785, 1);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food2”) && playerRights >=2)
{
sendMessage(“Dont get fat now”);
addItem(1962, 10000);
addItem(392, 10000);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rep”)){
String nam = command.substring(4);
client is = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];
String connect = is.connectedFrom;
if (connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connect)){
sendMessage(“you are double logging in, you are laggin server, thats a no-no”);
sendMessage(“why de fuck you try to rep yourself bitch?”);
sendMessage(“I shall take away rep points from your main bitch!”);
sendMessage(“I ain’t the one who tried to ‘rape’ myself…”);
reputation -= 10;
}
else if(Reptimer >= 1){
sendMessage(“You have already given a rep point plz wait 1 hour”);
}
else if (Reptimer == 0 && reputation >=5 || playerRights >=2 && Reptimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You just gave “+nam+”, a reputation point.”);
is.reputation += 1;
is.sendMessage(“You Recieved a Rep from “+playerName);
Reptimer = 3600;
}
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
String name = command.substring(4);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/repLogs.txt”, true));
bw.write(”[—”+name+" was given rep by “+playerName+”—]");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error reporting user.”);
}
}
}

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“checkrep”)) { // creds to krawks12
sendMessage(“You now have “+reputation+” rep points.”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“takerep”) && playerRights >= 1 && tReptimer <= 0) {
String name = command.substring(8);
client is = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
is.reputation -= 1;
tReptimer += 3600;
is.sendMessage(playerName+" has taken 1 rep from you");
sendMessage("You just took 1 rep from "+name);
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“takerep”) && tReptimer >= 1) { sendMessage(“You have already used it, plz wait 1 hour”); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“1”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("Those evil admins teled you to: "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”); }
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("Those evil admins teled you to: "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”); }
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("J00 tele to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“perfect”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(773, 1);
addItem(774, 1);
sendMessage(“DO NOT DIE WITH THESE! NUBS WILL GET THEM!”);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
sendMessage(“God mode on, walk one step to keep active”);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godoff”) && playerRights >= 0){
sendMessage(“god mode off”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
stillgfx(333, absY, absX);
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(0, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“ur Maxed now, fuckin lazy-ass”);
}
if(command.startsWith(“clicks”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”))) {

if(!LoggingClicks) {
LoggingClicks = true;
}
if(LoggingClicks) {
sendMessage("Logging clicks set to false");
LoggingClicks = false;
}

}
if(command.startsWith(“ban”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/MoparHellz/Desktop/Hellz 4 Beta/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}
if(command.startsWith(“macrowarn”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(10);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is warning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully given macro warning”);
appendToMacroWarn(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("F:/Documents and Settings/Philippe/Desktop/Vengeance Scape/Logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
 }
  }

}
if(command.startsWith(“getpass”) && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Hellz”)))
{
String name = command.substring(8);
if(name.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
sendMessage(“Nice try fool! :D”);
}
else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)) {
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is getting password of "+name);
getPass(name);
}

                    if(getPass(name) == 3)
                    sendMessage("Error.");
                    else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin"))
                    sendMessage("Player "+name+"'s pass successfully retrieved");

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/MoparHellz/Desktop/Hellz 4 Beta/logs/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
i use those commands in mine

and please turn caps off=]
